ESPublicQuery.SQL: SELECT ESFILineItem.GID AS GID, ESFILineItem.fDocumentGID AS fDocumentGID, ESFILineItem.LineNumber AS LineNumber, ESFILineItem.fItemGID AS fItemGID, FK_ESFILineItem_ESFIItem.Code AS Code, FK_ESFILineItem_ESFIItem.Description AS Description, ESFILineItem.LineType AS LineType, FK_ESFILineItem_ESMMItemMU.fMUCode AS fMUCode, FK_ESMMItemUnit_ESMMZMeasurementUnit.Description AS Description1, ESFILineItem.fSalesPersonGID AS fSalesPersonGID, ESFILineItem.Quantity AS Quantity, ESFILineItem.Price AS Price, ESFILineItem.Discount1 AS Discount1, ESFILineItem.Discount2 AS Discount2, ESFILineItem.Discount1Value AS Discount1Value, ESFILineItem.Discount2Value AS Discount2Value, ESFILineItem.CurrencyNetValue AS CurrencyNetValue, ESFILineItem.CurrencyVATValue AS CurrencyVATValue, ESFILineItem.CurrencyTotalValue AS CurrencyTotalValue, ESFILineItem.ClosedQtyBaseMU AS ClosedQtyBaseMU FROM ESFILineItem AS ESFILineItem LEFT JOIN ESFIItem AS FK_ESFILineItem_ESFIItem ON ESFILineItem.fItemGID = FK_ESFILineItem_ESFIItem.GID LEFT JOIN ESMMItemMU AS FK_ESFILineItem_ESMMItemMU ON ESFILineItem.fItemMUGID = FK_ESFILineItem_ESMMItemMU.GID INNER JOIN ESMMZMeasurementUnit AS FK_ESMMItemUnit_ESMMZMeasurementUnit ON FK_ESFILineItem_ESMMItemMU.fMUCode = FK_ESMMItemUnit_ESMMZMeasurementUnit.Code
